de.javasoft.swing
Class JYTabbedPane

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JTabbedPane
                  de.javasoft.swing.JYTabbedPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUIPropertySupport, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
JYPreferencesPanel
public class JYTabbedPane
extends javax.swing.JTabbedPane
implements IUIPropertySupport

Extended TabbedPane component which provides additional features. Features:

  • support for adding leading/trailing components beside the tabs (within tabPanel area)
  • integrated tab close button support
  • popup button for hidden tabs - useful for quick navigation
  • rotated tabs for left/right tab placement
  • tab gap support - including negative values for overlapping tabs
  • tab reorder support by dragging
  • support to justify tab icon placement
  • mouse scroll wheel support
  • tab scroll animation
  • configurable minimum and maximum tab size
  • stretched tab size support
  • colorizable tabs
  • full RTL support
    • Limitation: Wrap layout for tabs isn't supported.

    Version:
    1.24, 05.04.2011
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    addImpl

    protected void addImpl(java.awt.Component comp,
                       java.lang.Object constraints,
                       int index)
    JYTabbedPane makes use of a content panel, so child components must be added to the content panel (instead of the tabbed pane container like in JTabbedPane). This method adds a child to the content panel and UIResource components to the JYTabbedPane container.

    Overrides:
    addImpl in class java.awt.Container
    See Also:
    Container.addImpl(java.awt.Component, java.lang.Object, int)

    public void setTabBackgroundAt(java.awt.Color background,
                               int tabIndex)

    Parameters:

    tabIndex - Tab index.
